text: A District of Columbia court may exercise personal jurisdiction over a person domiciled in, organized under the laws of, or maintaining his or its principal place of business in, the District of Columbia as to any claim for relief.

chapter.text: Civil Jurisdiction and Service Outside the District of Columbia. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Bases of Personal Jurisdiction Over Persons Outside the District of Columbia. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Personal jurisdiction based upon enduring relationship.
